item.title: Server Text Help
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Ah, I see. Try this.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to the Staffzone, You've earned it! So try to keep it!"; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Server Text Help
item.dc:creator: @Son_of_Rambo Son of Rambo
item.description:
@Son_of_Rambo wrote:

Hello There Moparscape,

I am currently making a staffzone on the base of Deltascape.

I need to add two genies in it saying “Welcome To Staffzone, youve earned it. NOW TRY KEEP IT…”

[Quote]
I’ve added the two genies to the spot in autospawn.cfg - Successfull.[/quote]

I’ve put the code into NPChandler.java - The two genies still don’t talk, Can you tell me what i’ve did wrong?

Code:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to Staffzone, You earned it! try keep it..."; }

Thanks Alot,
Jamie14

Read full topic
